import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-new-password', templateUrl: './new-password.component.html', styleUrls: ['./new-password.component.scss'] }) export class NewPasswordComponent implements OnInit { constructor() {} ngOnInit(): void {} }

Setup New Password

Use 8 or more characters with a mix of letters, numbers & symbols.
